iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU Raw TV
iptvSourceProviders.description: Combined New Zealand and Australian (Sydney) Freeview raw TV playlist without extra headers, suitable for general IPTV clients.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU Raw Radio
iptvSourceProviders.description: Combined New Zealand and Australian (Sydney) Freeview raw radio playlist without extra headers.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU Raw TV & Radio
iptvSourceProviders.description: Combined New Zealand and Australian (Sydney) Freeview raw TV and radio playlist for generic IPTV clients.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU KODI TV
iptvSourceProviders.description: KODI-optimized TV playlist for NZ & AU Freeview with X_FORWARD headers for use with IPTV Simple Client.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU KODI Radio
iptvSourceProviders.description: KODI-optimized radio playlist for NZ & AU Freeview with X_FORWARD headers.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU KODI TV & Radio
iptvSourceProviders.description: KODI-optimized combined TV and radio playlist for NZ & AU Freeview with X_FORWARD headers.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU Tvheadend TV
iptvSourceProviders.description: Tvheadend TV playlist for NZ & AU Freeview where streams are piped through ffmpeg to MPEG-TS.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU Tvheadend Radio
iptvSourceProviders.description: Tvheadend radio playlist for NZ & AU Freeview with streams piped through ffmpeg to MPEG-TS.

iptvSourceProviders.name: NZAU Tvheadend TV & Radio
iptvSourceProviders.description: Tvheadend combined TV and radio playlist for NZ & AU Freeview with ffmpeg piping to MPEG-TS.
